sense.def:
A line
je dolgo, ozko znamenje na površini nečesa.

seg.quote: ...a diagonal red line on the label.
...a straight line joining those two points.

sense.def:
The lines on someone's face
so gube na obrazu.

A line of people or things
je število oseb ali stvari, postavljenih v vrsti.

seg.quote: ...long lines of poplar trees.
The men formed themselves into a line.

sense.def:
Dolg kos vrvice ali žice lahko imenujemo
a line
, kadar jo uporabljamo v določen namen.

seg.quote: ...washing hanging on a line.
The fish was heavy at the end of my line.
...a telephone line.

sense.def:
Line
uporabljamo tudi, kadar govorimo o poti, po kateri se osebe ali stvari premikajo ali so poslane.

seg.quote: Wireless waves travel in straight lines.
All lines of communication had been cut.
...a long dripping tunnel under the railway line.
They took the wrong line on the London Tube.

sense.def:
Izraz
line
lahko uporabljamo za rob, obris ali obliko nečesa.

seg.quote: ...the firm, delicate lines of Paxton's buildings.
...the hard thin line of Lynn's mouth.

sense.def:
Line
se nanaša tudi na mejo med določenimi območji, stvarmi ali vrstami ljudi.

seg.quote: They were dropped by parachute behind enemy lines.
The traditional social dividing lines are becoming blurred.
She will be living below the poverty line.

sense.def:
A line
je tudi ena od vrst besedila v zapisu ali stavek, ki ga pove igralec v igri ali filmu.

seg.quote: I have read every line.
She found it impossible to remember her lines.

sense.def:
The line
je odnos ali politika določene osebe do nekega problema ali téme.

seg.quote: ...the official line of the Labour Party.
The President takes a much harder line.

sense.def:
One's line of business, work or research
je vrsta dela ali raziskovanja, ki ga opravljamo.

seg.quote: A man in my line of business has to take precautions.
...his particular line of research.

sense.def:
A line
je tudi vrsta izdelka, ki ga neko podjetje izdeluje ali prodaja.

seg.quote: Unprofitable lines will be discontinued.

sense.def:
A particular line of people or things
je vrsta oseb ali stvari, ki so nekako povezane in obstajajo že dolgo časa.

seg.quote: ...the long line of American Presidents.

sense.def:
Kadar osebe ali stvari
line a road or room
, so v velikem številu navzoče ob robovih ali straneh ceste ali sobe.

seg.quote: The streets were lined with cars.

sense.def:
To line a container or a piece of clothing
pomeni pokriti notranjo površino nečesa s papirjem ali blagom.

seg.quote: Line the cupboards and drawers with paper.
...a coffin lined with velvet.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
lines a container or an area inside a person, animal, or plant
, oblikuje plast prek notranje površine nečesa, na primer posode, rastline ali organa v človeku ali živali.

seg.quote: ...tiny hairs lining the nose.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
in line for something
, bo tisto najverjetneje dobil.

seg.quote: You are next in line for promotion.

sense.def:
Kadar je ena oseba ali skupina
in line with others
, počne isto kot druge osebe ali skupine.

seg.quote: Africa may bring itself in line with the rest of the world on this matter.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj storjeno
in line with a policy or guideline
, je storjeno v skladu z neko politiko ali smernico.

To keep someone in line
pomeni nekoga prisiliti, da se vede tako, kot se mora vesti.

Kdor je
on line
, dela z računalnikom ali je povezan z računalniško mrežo.

cit.quote: opremljen z računalnikom; priklopljen na računalniško mrežo, na liniji

sense.def:
Kadar je človekova služba ali ugled
on the line
, jo lahko izgubi ali okrni, ker je storil nekaj drznega ali neumnega.

cit.quote: na nitki, v nevarnosti, na kocki

seg.quote: I didn't dare fight and put my job on the line, so I went along with them.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
on particular lines
ali
along particular lines
, se zgodi na določen način.

seg.quote: The population is split along religious lines.

sense.def:
Izraza
on the lines of
in
along the lines of
uporabimo, kadar dajemo splošni opis tistega, kar je nekdo rekel ali kar želimo.

seg.quote: Driberg opened with a question on the lines of: ‘What do you think about the present political situation?’

sense.def:
To be on the right lines
pomeni ravnati razumno ali tako, da bo najverjetneje prineslo koristne posledice.

seg.quote: Do his policies strike you as being on the right lines?

sense.def:
To be out of line
ali
to step out of line
pomeni ne se vesti tako, kot bi bilo treba.

To draw the line at a particular activity
pomeni zavrniti neko dejanje, ker je to več, kot smo pripravljeni storiti.

seg.quote: There is a point at which they will have to draw the line.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
somewhere along the line
, se zgodi med nekim postopkom ali dejavnostjo.

seg.quote: We slipped up somewhere along the line.

B.xr:
to
drop
someone
a line:
glej
drop

to
read between the lines:
glej
read

sense.def:
To line up
ali
to line people up
pomeni, da ljudje stojijo v vrsti in čakajo.

seg.quote: They lined us up and marched us off.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is lined up for someone
, je pripravljeno za nekoga.

seg.quote: A formal farewell party was lined up.
